html.h2: stuck? need a shoulder to cry on?

p.strong: you should speak to my peoples

html.p: so you've read the setup guide and are still having problems? splunk answers is a great place to start if you're having issues with this app. there are people 1000x smarter than me over there.
you can also contact me directly at support@splunkstart.com, but it will take me some time to reply.
